courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: THEA 371, THEA 372, THEA 373, and THEA 374; and concurrent registration in THEA 375, THEA 376 and THEA 378.
description: Concentrated training in movement for the stage, body alignment and awareness. Enrollment limited to Theatre majors. Prerequisite: THEA 371, THEA 372, THEA 373, and THEA 374; and concurrent registration in THEA 375, THEA 376 and THEA 378.
label: Acting Studio II: Movement
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to students with Sophomore, Junior, or Senior class standing. Restricted to BFA:Theatre: Acting -UIUC.
